Two studies out today raised concerns about treatment for early stage cervical cancer that had gained favor in the U.S the studies published online and the New England Journal of medicine same minimally invasive surgery is actually worse for women than standard surgery now doctors are starting to shy away from it NPR's Richard Harris reports
